code: import{USER_DATA_SUCCESS,USER_DATA_REQUEST,USER_DATA_FAIL,USER_DATA_LOGOUT,ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_REQUEST,ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_SUCCESS,ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_FAIL,REMOVE_SELECTED_GUEST_USERS,SELECTED_ROLE_GUEST_USER,REMOVE_ROLE_GUEST_USER,TOKEN_USER_REQUEST,TOKEN_USER_SUCCESS,TOKEN_USER_FAIL,TOKEN_USER_REMOVE}from"../constants/userConstants";export var userDataReducer=function userDataReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{user:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case USER_DATA_REQUEST:return{loading:true,user:[]};case USER_DATA_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,user:action.payload};case USER_DATA_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case USER_DATA_LOGOUT:return{user:[]};default:return state;}};export var GuestUserDataReducer=function GuestUserDataReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{guestUsers:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_REQUEST:return{loading:true,guestUsers:[]};case ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,guestUsers:action.payload};case ALL_INVITATION_BY_ADMIN_USER_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case REMOVE_SELECTED_GUEST_USERS:return{guestUsers:[]};default:return state;}};export var TokenUserReducer=function TokenUserReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{tokenUser:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TOKEN_USER_REQUEST:return{loading:true,tokenUser:[]};case TOKEN_USER_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,tokenUser:action.payload};case TOKEN_USER_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case TOKEN_USER_REMOVE:return{tokenUser:[]};default:return state;}};
